segment.source: How to Modify Virtual Registry Key Information
segment.target: How to Modify Virtual Registry Key Information

segment.source: How to Modify Virtual Registry Key Information
segment.target: How to Modify Virtual Registry Key Information

segment.source: How to Modify Virtual Registry Key Information
segment.target: How to Modify Virtual Registry Key Information

segment.source: After you sequence an application but before you save it, you can modify its registry settings.
segment.target: After you sequence an application but before you save it, you can modify its registry settings.

segment.source: Use the following procedures to modify a sequenced application package's registry values and registry keys.
segment.target: Use the following procedures to modify a sequenced application package's registry values and registry keys.

segment.source: To modify a registry key
segment.target: To modify a registry key

segment.source: Click the Virtual Registry Key tab.
segment.target: Click the Virtual Registry Key tab.

segment.source: Double-click the Registry folder to expand its contents.
segment.target: Double-click the Registry folder to expand its contents.

segment.source: In the left pane, right-click the folder you want to modify and select Key.
segment.target: In the left pane, right-click the folder you want to modify and select Key.

segment.source: To create a new registry key, on the menu, select New.
segment.target: To create a new registry key, on the menu, select New.

segment.source: A new registry key will appear in the folder you selected.
segment.target: A new registry key will appear in the folder you selected.

segment.source: To rename a registry key, on the menu, select Rename.
segment.target: To rename a registry key, on the menu, select Rename.

segment.source: Type a new value name in the text box.
segment.target: Type a new value name in the text box.

segment.source: To delete a registry key, on the menu, select Delete.
segment.target: To delete a registry key, on the menu, select Delete.

segment.source: To override the local key, on the menu, select Override Local Key, or to merge with the local key, select Merge with Local Key.
segment.target: To override the local key, on the menu, select Override Local Key, or to merge with the local key, select Merge with Local Key.

segment.source: To modify a registry value
segment.target: To modify a registry value

segment.source: Click the Virtual Registry Value tab.
segment.target: Click the Virtual Registry Value tab.

segment.source: Double-click the Registry folder to expand its contents.
segment.target: Double-click the Registry folder to expand its contents.

segment.source: In the left pane, right-click the folder you want to modify and select Value.
segment.target: In the left pane, right-click the folder you want to modify and select Value.

segment.source: To add a string, on the menu, select Add String.
segment.target: To add a string, on the menu, select Add String.

segment.source: To add a binary, on the menu, select Add Binary.
segment.target: To add a binary, on the menu, select Add Binary.

segment.source: To add a DWORD, on the menu, select Add DWORD.
segment.target: To add a DWORD, on the menu, select Add DWORD.

segment.source: To delete a registry value, right-click a value and select Delete.
segment.target: To delete a registry value, right-click a value and select Delete.

segment.source: To rename a registry value, right-click a registry value and select Rename.
segment.target: To rename a registry value, right-click a registry value and select Rename.
